scripts.say: Ahh... The glorious light born from clashing souls... O, Creator, please grace us with your attention... for this is the light of the Awakening you desire...
So beautiful, yet so frail... I can't help but want to crush it in my grasp... Ahahaha, ahahaha...
I thought this would happen... Very well. It seems this is where our plans come to an end.
Is that so...? How regrettable~ Then let us depart... *Giggle*... We shall find ourselves a new Sanctuary...
Hey... W-wait! I'm not finished with you...!
ERADICATION SEQUENCE INITIATED. PLEASE EVACUATE THE AREA IMMEDIATELY.
ERADICATION SEQUENCE INITIATED. PLEASE EVACUATE THE AREA IMMEDIATELY.
ERADICATION SEQUENCE INITIATED. PLEASE EVACUATE THE AREA IMMEDIATELY.
My sister, everything in this world has its cause and effect. We must always look for another possibility through this infinite cycle of death and rebirth...
One day you will understand the reason why we do what we do...
May all the gods watch over you...
The simulation at Test Site Gamma has concluded.
Hm? Let me see... Test Site Gamma...? Oh, that insignificant zoo of a test site...
Yes, that one. Hmm, "resists attempts at control and unleashes latent power to save her friends"... This is beyond our expectations.
Interesting... By deviating from their predetermined destiny, they've managed to break free from the shackles of fate... I thought we were in control of everything, but perhaps that was all a lie...
Nevertheless, this is superb data. It seems the Creator has taken a liking to these girls.
Hmph! It's no more than the Creator's way of playing a joke on us.
The data shows... they need more experience. At the very least... we can't let them face each other yet.
Resetting all Pawns. Clearing all data. Increasing all parameters by 5%... Releasing the key... And so, the next round of testing begins...
